title: 5th Street Apts- Newly Remodeled Junior Bedroom Apt! CALL NOW!
posting_body: 5th Street Apartments is a clean and quiet building in the heart of Koreatown.
We will have Junior bedroom apartment available for mid September move in.
Unit benefits include laminate, balcony, stove, granite counters, plenty of closet space, radiant heat and air conditioner on the wall.
Community benefits include 1 assigned parking spot in gate underground garage, 3 laundry rooms and elevator.
Close to schools, shops, and restaurants.
We are close to the MTA, Ralphs, 24 hour fitness, CVS, Cahuenga Elementary, and the Metro Red Line, and all major freeways.
Professionally managed by Statewide Enterprises, Inc. (A+ rated by the Better Business Bureau).
Pictures in this ad are a representation and may not reflect the actual apartment that is currently available.
To View a virtual tour of unit 316 - Junior Bed/1Bath - <URL>
-Quoted security deposit is on approved credit.
-6 or 12 month lease - Six month lease available with $200 monthly surcharge.
The rent, deposit, concession and terms listed in this ad are only valid for the actual date that this ad was initially posted.
